COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Could you repeat the original request?

EXCELLENT_I_WILL_LET_THE_RECIPIENT_KNOW_.message: Excellent. I will let the recipient know you are on your way.

FLAVOUR_0_ADTEXT.message: GOING TO the {system} system? Money paid for delivery of cargo.

FLAVOUR_0_FAILUREMSG.message: Unacceptable! You took forever over that delivery. I'm not willing to pay you.

FLAVOUR_0_INTROTEXT.message: Hi, I'm {name}. I'll pay you {cash} if you will deliver {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_0_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you for the delivery. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_0_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: My customer pays for the delivery.

FLAVOUR_1_ADTEXT.message: WANTED. Delivery of cargo to the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_1_FAILUREMSG.message: I'm frustrated by the late delivery, and I refuse to pay you.

FLAVOUR_1_INTROTEXT.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'm willing to pay {cash} for a ship to carry {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_1_SUCCESSMSG.message: The goods have been received and you have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_2_ADTEXT.message: URGENT. Fast ship needed to deliver cargo to the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_2_FAILUREMSG.message: I was quite clear about the deadline and am very disappointed by the late delivery. You will not be paid.

FLAVOUR_2_INTROTEXT.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'm willing to pay {cash} for a ship to carry {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_2_SUCCESSMSG.message: You have been paid in full for the delivery. Thank you.

FLAVOUR_2_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: It must be delivered by the deadline or we may not get funding.

FLAVOUR_3_ADTEXT.message: DELIVERY. Valuable Cargo to the {system} system. {cash} to an experienced pilot.

FLAVOUR_3_FAILUREMSG.message: Useless! I will never depend on you again! Needless to say, you will not be paid for this.

FLAVOUR_3_INTROTEXT.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'm willing to pay {cash} for a ship to carry {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_3_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your timely and discrete service is much appreciated. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_4_ADTEXT.message: CARGO SERVICE. We require a ship for a delivery to {system} system.

FLAVOUR_4_FAILUREMSG.message: Your ship registration has been noted, we will reject all further applications for work from you.

FLAVOUR_4_INTROTEXT.message: Greetings. This is an automated message from {name} Transport Services. We pay {cash} for the run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_4_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your timely and discrete service is much appreciated. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_4_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: We would be happy to pay you less money.

FLAVOUR_5_FAILUREMSG.message: What are these? Oh, you took so long that I forgot I'd even sent this!

FLAVOUR_5_INTROTEXT.message: Nice to meet you. I'm {name} and I work for the {starport} administration. We pay {cash} to someone who is able to move our goods to {starport}. No rush, no hassles.

FLAVOUR_5_SUCCESSMSG.message: Oh wonderful. We will start unloading immediately. Thank you so much.

FLAVOUR_5_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: Is it a lot? I don't think so.

FLAVOUR_6_ADTEXT.message: SHORT-RANGE CARGO RUN. Delivery of goods to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_6_FAILUREMSG.message: I could have delivered it faster myself. I'm not paying you.

FLAVOUR_6_INTROTEXT.message: Hi. I'm {name} and I will pay {cash} for a delivery to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_6_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you for the goods, you have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_6_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: I don't think it's a lot.

FLAVOUR_7_ADTEXT.message: INTER-PLANETARY CARGO RUN. Freight of local cargo to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_7_FAILUREMSG.message: Our customers are not going to be happy with this. Do not expect to be paid.

FLAVOUR_7_INTROTEXT.message: Hello. We need {cargoname} delivered to {starport} as soon as possible. Standard payment for this shipment is {cash}.

FLAVOUR_7_SUCCESSMSG.message: Excellent, we've credited the funds into your account.

FLAVOUR_7_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: Standard rates, we work with the market.

FLAVOUR_8_ADTEXT.message: NEARBY DELIVERY. Require quick delivery of cargo to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_8_FAILUREMSG.message: You were offered a premium for quick delivery! I refuse to pay for this.

FLAVOUR_8_INTROTEXT.message: My name is {name} and I need {cargoname} delivered to a client at {starport} pronto, I'll pay you {cash} credits if you get it there in a reasonable time.

FLAVOUR_8_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your prompt delivery is appreciated, I have credited your account accordingly.

FLAVOUR_9_ADTEXT.message: FAST TRANSPORT. Urgent dispatch of perishables to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_9_FAILUREMSG.message: It's all spoilt, this is of no use to anyone! We cannot and will not pay you.

FLAVOUR_9_INTROTEXT.message: Greetings, we're behind with our produce shipment and need {cargoname} delivered to {starport} urgently. We'll pay you {cash} for your troubles.

FLAVOUR_9_SUCCESSMSG.message: Grand! We'll start unpacking immediately. I'll have your account updated right away.

FLAVOUR_10_ADTEXT.message: CARGO SERVICE. We require a ship for a delivery to {system} system.

FLAVOUR_10_FAILUREMSG.message: Your ship registration has been noted, we will reject all further applications for work from you.

FLAVOUR_10_INTROTEXT.message: Greetings, my name is {name} and I work for the {starport} administration. We pay {cash} for the run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_10_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your timely and discrete service is much appreciated. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_10_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: We would be happy to pay you less money.

FLAVOUR_11_ADTEXT.message: CARGO SERVICE. We require a ship for a delivery to {system} system.

FLAVOUR_11_FAILUREMSG.message: Your ship registration has been noted, we will reject all further applications for work from you.

FLAVOUR_11_INTROTEXT.message: Greetings, my name is {name} and I work for Haber Corp. We pay {cash} for the run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_11_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your timely and discrete service is much appreciated. Thank you.

FLAVOUR_11_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: Well, we would be happy to pay you less.

HOW_SOON_MUST_IT_BE_DELIVERED.message: How soon must it be delivered?

IT_COULD_BE_DANGEROUS_YOU_SHOULD_MAKE_SU.message: It could be dangerous, you should make sure you're adequately prepared.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_0.message: You're going to regret dealing with {client}

PIRATE_TAUNTS_1.message: Looks like my paycheck has arrived!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_2.message: You're working for {client}? That was a bad idea.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_3.message: Your cargo and your life, pilot!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_4.message: I'm sure this will bring a pretty penny on the market

PIRATE_TAUNTS_5.message: Today isn't your lucky day! Prepare to die.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_6.message: Tell my old friend {client} that I'll see them in hell!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_7.message: That cargo isn't going to reach it's destination today.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_9.message: You'll pay for that cargo, with your life.

THIS_IS_A_VALUABLE_CARGO_YOU_SHOULD_KEEP.message: This is valuable cargo, you should keep your eyes open.

THIS_IS_VERY_RISKY_YOU_WILL_ALMOST_CERTA.message: This is very risky, you will almost certainly run into resistance.

WILL_I_BE_IN_ANY_DANGER.message: Will I be in any danger?

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_ENOUGH_CARGO_SPACE_ON_YO.message: You do not have enough cargo space on your ship.

DENY_0.message: I'm sorry, but I don't think I can trust you with this delivery.

DENY_1.message: Come back when you have some qualifications.

DENY_2.message: I don't think you're the pilot I'm looking for.

DENY_3.message: You don't look like someone I can trust with this delivery.

DENY_4.message: You're not the kind of pilot I'm looking for.

DENY_5.message: You seem much too inexperienced to handle a task of this importance.

DENY_6.message: I have never heard of you. I need someone experienced for this delivery.

DENY_7.message: I'm not willing to risk this delivery on someone without any qualifications like you.
